alert.note: Alert for Bradley; Hamilton (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 10:28AM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Bradley and southern Hamilton Counties through NOON EDT... At 1127 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Signal Mountain to 7 miles northwest of South Cleveland. Movement was south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Chattanooga, Cleveland, Signal Mountain, Rossville, Walden, Ridgeside, Harrison, South Cleveland, Red Bank and Collegedale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
